title: Golem Vocalizations
description: Golem Vocalizations sound package with 164 high-quality big-monster sound effects, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/golem-vocalizations-preview

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/6cehk3u25hqemgw/MSE%20-%20Golem%20Vocalizations.pdf?dl=0


The Golem is a creature of enormous size, with monstrous strength, hardy and agile, with a low voice and stone fortitude. They are often found near lonely rocks. All of its qualities formed the basis of the creature's creation and vocalization design.


The collection contains 17 voice actions, including 164 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 16 voice sounds during an attack
  • 12 battle shouts
  • 16 deaths
  • 16 growls
  • 16 pains
  • 16 roars
  • 8 snarls
  • 12 victory shouts
  • 4 coughing sounds
  • 4 effort sounds
  • 8 groans
  • 8 idle voice sounds
  • 8 sounds when jumping
  • 4 laughing sounds
  • 4 sounds of upset
  • 8 snorting sounds
  • 4 sounds of tiredness


Among the attacking type of vocalizations there are both short and long ones, the pain type vocalizations also have different lengths. The voice samples are quite dry and ready for further processing. Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs. 


This package is perfect for creating the voices of big monsters: golem, rock golem, earth elemental, giant, titan, troll, guardian, devil, dinosaur and more. 


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, horror or any other where monsters live and roar. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 164 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 17 voice actions
  • 80 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 40 voice samples of the pain type
  • 44 neutral type voice samples
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, dark fantasy, horror and more

 

Number of Audio Waves: 164

Number of Audio Cues: 164

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: All

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
